select b.id,u.phone,b.category_id,bc.name as categoryName,b.number,b.user_name,b.illustrated1,b.illustrated2,b.remark1, b.remark2,b.best_time, b.source,b.telephone,b.cycle,b.starting_price,b.scheme_id,b.credit,b.limited,b.market_integral, b.underline_integral,(select s.name from shengxian_staff s where b.staff_id =s.id )staff_name,b.address, b.staff_id, (select bs.scheme_name from shengxian_business_scheme bs where bs.scheme_id =b.scheme_id and bs.business_id=b.business_id)scheme_name from shengxian_binding b inner join shengxian_binding_category bc on bc.id=b.category_id left join user u on u.id=b.user_id where b.id=#{id} and b.is_del=0
